scripts.build:js: terser ./src/js/BorderPaint.js -c -m toplevel -o ./docs/js/BorderPaint.js && terser ./src/js/ButtonPaint.js -c -m toplevel -o ./docs/js/ButtonPaint.js && terser ./src/js/index.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/index.mjs && terser ./src/js/linkFactory.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/linkFactory.mjs && terser ./src/js/loadSW.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/loadSW.mjs && terser ./src/js/links.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/links.mjs && terser ./src/js/panelFactory.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/panelFactory.mjs && terser ./src/js/projects.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/projects.mjs
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./docs && mkdir docs && cd ./docs && mkdir js && cd ../
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:sass && npm run build:js
